teams.name: 4P Health Wallet

teams.longDescription: The blockchain-based health wallet empowers patients to securely manage and share their medical data, enabling seamless collaboration between healthcare providers, insurers, and patients for improved care coordination

teams.name: A0X
teams.shortDescription: Web3-focused venture dedicated to designing, building, and scaling crypto-native products
teams.longDescription: A0x is a Web3-focused venture dedicated to designing, building, and scaling crypto-native products and infrastructure. The team works at the intersection of blockchain, DeFi, and smart contract engineering, creating protocols and tools that prioritize security, capital efficiency, and real-world usability. With a strong emphasis on research-driven development and rigorous technical validation, A0x helps projects go from concept to production, supporting everything from protocol architecture and token design to go-to-market and ecosystem growth. By combining deep technical expertise with a product- and founder-friendly mindset, A0x aims to accelerate the next generation of blockchain applications and make advanced crypto infrastructure accessible to builders and users globally.

teams.name: Agoric Systems
teams.shortDescription: A Proof-of-Stake chain utilizing secure JavaScript smart contracts to build and deploy DeFi.
teams.longDescription: Agoric is an open-source development company launching an interoperable Proof-of-Stake chain and economy. Their JavaScript-native smart contract platform offers developers a safe, reusable library of DeFi components to rapidly build and deploy on-chain.

teams.name: Airship
teams.shortDescription: Efficient, Fast, Affordable Airships for Global Trade
teams.longDescription: Airship Industries isn't just changing how freight moves—we're transforming the economics of global logistics. Our approach combines the speed of air freight with costs closer to trucking, creating an unparalleled value proposition. By utilizing uncongested skyways and autonomous systems, we minimize fuel consumption, reduce labor costs, and optimize routes for maximum efficiency. This translates to a potential cost reduction of up to 50% while slashing emissions by 75%. Moreover, our ability to bypass congested ports and deliver directly to customer sites opens up new markets and opportunities. With Airship Industries, businesses can expand their reach, accelerate their supply chains, and boost their bottom line.

teams.name: aleph.im
teams.shortDescription: Aleph.im is a crosschain network featuring decentralized DB (inc. file storage), computing & decentralized ID framework.
teams.longDescription: Aleph.im is a crosschain network featuring decentralized database (inc. file storage), computing & a decentralized ID framework. We support Ethereum, Polkadot/Kusama/Substrate, Cosmos, BinanceChain and Solana. We are currently focused on supercharging the DeFi ecosystem.

teams.name: ALLOC8
teams.shortDescription: Onchain Credit, Simplified
teams.longDescription: Alloc8 is a decentralized finance (DeFi) protocol that enables users to access leveraged positions across various DeFi applications through Gnosis Safe integration. The platform simplifies on-chain credit, allowing users to obtain up to 10x leverage for participating in DeFi protocols, earning rewards, and potentially qualifying for airdrops.

teams.name: AmFi
teams.shortDescription: AmFi makes it simple, fast, and cost effective for fintechs and asset managers to deploy and sell new debt financial products by leveraging new regulation and blockchain technology.
teams.longDescription: AmFi has developed a financial platform that connects originators to investors using blockchain as the core technology. Originators structure, distribute, and operate their own financial products easily with fewer intermediaries and more standardization and efficiency to ultimately access more liquidity. Investors have access to credit products with attractive profitability, structured with control, security, and transparency.  In addition, the AmFi platform was designed in such a way that several traditional financial assets are tokenized and used in operations.

teams.name: AR Data Technologies Inc.
teams.shortDescription: AR Data Technologies is a pioneering company specializing in decentralized technology engineering services, with particular expertise in IPFS, Libp2p, Filecoin, and EVM Smart Contracts. Leveraging advanced knowledge in these cutting-edge technologies, along with robust software and data engineering capabilities, AR Data Technologies delivers innovative, scalable solutions that empower businesses to harness the full potential of decentralized systems and blockchain technology.
teams.longDescription:
AR Data Technologies is a pioneering company at the forefront of decentralized technology engineering, specializing in IPFS, Libp2p, Filecoin, and EVM Smart Contracts, while also offering comprehensive software and data engineering services.

 

With deep expertise in building distributed web applications, peer-to-peer systems, decentralized storage solutions, and blockchain-based smart contracts, AR Data Technologies empowers businesses to harness the full potential of decentralized systems and blockchain technology. 

 

The company's innovative approach combines cutting-edge technical knowledge with a collaborative partnership model, ensuring scalable, secure, and tailored solutions that address specific business challenges across various industries, including finance, supply chain, healthcare, and media.

 

AR Data Technologies' holistic service offering spans from concept and design to implementation and maintenance, backed by a team of seasoned professionals who contribute to open-source projects and maintain strong ties with the academic community.

teams.name: Areta
teams.shortDescription: We provide independent investment banking services for web3.
teams.longDescription: Areta (formerly web3 Studios) is a global investment banking firm for the web3 and digital assets economy.  Founded by McKinsey and Blackstone alumni, we support our clients with customized services for strategic transactions across the entire life cycle of organizations, including mergers and acquisitions, capital formation, and strategic governance.

teams.name: Arkhai
teams.shortDescription: Two-sided marketplace for compute being turned into a data structure for coordinating decentralized intelligence.
teams.longDescription:
Autonomous agents are just beginning to trade simple assets like stocks or ETH. In the future, everyone will have an AI agent negotiating on their behalf, trading with other agents, buying and selling data, compute, and everyday items to meet their personal financial goals.

Arkhai is building the only platform that lets agents barter and exchange complex combinations of goods and services on behalf of their owners.

We are starting with buying and selling compute in a distributed network. We will expand to storage, bandwidth, verifiable computing, off-chain compute jobs from smart contracts, RWA marketplaces, tokenization of latent computing power, bridging, energy, and more. 

In the future, Arkhai will be the new Amazon that lets any agent exchange goods and services to maximize the utility of the owners they represent.

teams.name: Artizen
teams.shortDescription: Artizen awards grants to creators at the intersection of art, tech, science, and design.
teams.longDescription: Artizen is on a mission to unlock human creativity. By empowering communities to directly fund and curate new grants, we radically increase support for creators of every kind. With human creativity everything is possible, and together we can build the world we all want to live in.

teams.name: Athena DAO

teams.longDescription: AthenaDAO (Decentralized Autonomous Organization) is a collective leveraging blockchain and crypto to fund women’s reproductive health.

teams.name: Atomica
teams.shortDescription: A Risk Transfer Protocol for Decentralized Finance.
teams.longDescription:
Atomica is an algorithmic, autonomous protocol built for developers and capital providers to pool, buy and sell DeFi risks.
Users may earn interest from an existing market or launch a new one to provide protocol users with compensation in case of a fund loss through bugs, hacks or oracle failures.

teams.name: Atoms.org
teams.shortDescription: Developing smart research contracts mediated by peer-to-peer review networks.
teams.longDescription: Atoms.org intends to improve incentives in science by developing smart research contracts mediated by peer-to-peer review networks. These will collectively reward scientific contributions, including proposals, papers, replications, datasets, analyses, annotations, editorials, and more.

teams.name: AuraSci
teams.shortDescription: AuraSci marks a new era in decentralized, interdisciplinary science, uniting innovative researchers and thinkers to reshape scientific exploration.
teams.longDescription: We champion a unique trust model through open, transparent, and collaborative methods, transcending traditional boundaries to build a global network. Driven by creativity, curiosity, and critical thinking, AuraSci is redefining research and innovation, creating a platform where trust and collaboration are fundamental to scientific progress.

teams.name: Autonomy Network
teams.shortDescription: An automation protocol for on-chain features like limits, stops, and recurring payments.
teams.longDescription:
The Autonomy Network is a decentralized automation solution powering the Web3 with on-chain conditional execution.

Autonomy's genuine utility token enables users to pay discounted network fees, defer execution payments and is required to execute transactions.

teams.name: Azos Labs
teams.shortDescription: Creates a protocol for an impact backed stablecoin.
teams.longDescription: Azos is a revolutionary over-collateralized stablecoin protocol that serves as the liquidity engine for impact investments. The platform enables users to unlock capital from climate-focused assets without selling them, creating a bridge between decentralized finance and impact investing. The protocol operates through a straightforward collateral-backed lending system where users deposit climate assets such as KLIMA (carbon-backed tokens), USDGLO (impact stablecoin), and HLSP (Helios Blended Pool tokens) as collateral (more assets supported into the future). In return, users can mint AZUSD, a stable digital currency pegged to $1 USD that maintains its value through various stability mechanisms. What sets Azos apart is its exclusive focus on impact assets - it's 100% backed by impact assets including green bonds, solar farms, carbon credits, and forest restoration projects. This approach transforms idle climate tokens into productive capital while maintaining full upside exposure to environmental projects. Users can borrow at competitive rates of just 0.5-5% annually while supporting positive global impact with every transaction. Built on proven DeFi infrastructure from MakerDAO, Reflexer Finance, and HAI Protocol, Azos inherits years of security testing and real-world usage from protocols managing billions in value. The platform features advanced risk management with automated liquidation systems, Dutch auction mechanisms, and algorithmic market operations to maintain stability. Mission and Vision Azos positions itself as the reserve currency of the regenerative economy, creating a globally accessible cooperation network where every exchange supports positive environmental and social change. The protocol unlocks latent liquidity of impact assets while reducing friction for positive impact makers to access capital.

teams.name: Balancer Labs
teams.shortDescription: Your DeFi liquidity infrastructure.
teams.longDescription: Balancer’s mission is to accelerate innovation in DeFi by providing access to secure infrastructure for liquidity applications. As a core building block of DeFi, Balancer Protocol is community driven and is reliable, open-source, and permissionless. Projects build on Balancer to create new, innovative types of pools and financial dApps.

teams.name: Bankless Consulting
teams.shortDescription: Bankless Consulting is the world's first web3-native consulting firm.
teams.longDescription: Bankless Consulting is the world's first web3-native consulting firm. Whether you're a DAO or a traditional enterprise, they’ll help you capture the potential of the rapidly expanding decentralized economy.  Bankless Consulting can solve almost any problem by harnessing the talents of thousands of BanklessDAO members. With expertise crossing all facets of web3, dApp design, community and process, they bring the leading edge of technology and talent to your projects.  Bankless Consulting has consultants on every continent, from a diversity of backgrounds, with decades of experience in management, technology, finance, marketing and governance.

teams.name: Beaker

teams.longDescription: Beaker DAO is a collective that supports the expansion of decentralized science. Through research funding and IP management, the DAO aims to promote open accessibility & create decentralized market liquidity across the DeSci space.

teams.longDescription: Bitcoin backed stablecoin

teams.name: Blockful

teams.longDescription: We're here to optimize human coordination by helping DAOs last longer through better participation, research, and governance. We see a future driven by global coordination, needing better tools and mechanisms.

teams.name: BlockScience
teams.shortDescription: BlockScience® is a complex systems engineering firm that combines research and engineering to design safe and resilient socio-technical systems.
teams.longDescription:
BlockScience® is a complex systems engineering, R&D, and analytics firm. Their goal is to combine academic-grade research with advanced mathematical and computational engineering to design safe and resilient socio-technical systems. With deep expertise in Blockchain, Token Engineering, AI, Data Science, and Operations Research, they provide engineering, design, and analytics services to a wide range of clients including for-profit, non-profit, academic, and government organizations. 


Their R&D occurs in iterative cycles between open-source research and software development, and application of the research and tools to client projects. BlockScience client work includes pre-launch design and post-launch monitoring and maintenance of economic and governance mechanisms based on research, simulation, and analysis. With this unique blend of engineering, data science, and social science expertise, the BlockScience team aims to diagnose and solve today’s most challenging frontier socio-technical problems.

teams.name: Body Mind Method™
teams.shortDescription: Science-based somatic protocols for focus, resilience & adaptability
teams.longDescription:
Body Mind Method™ — a science-based system of somatic neuroplasticity protocols that train focus, regulate stress, and build adaptability through targeted movement and the nervous system.


This isn’t fitness, meditation, or another wellness hack. It’s a new behavioral infrastructure for performing and thriving under pressure.


Today, Body Mind Method™ provides individuals, teams, and wellness organizations with short-form somatic interventions that restore focus, cognitive flexibility, emotional regulation, and adaptability.


In an era defined by burnout, chronic distraction, and pharmaceutical shortcuts, we don’t need another productivity tip. We need a new operating system for genuine resilience.


That’s what we're building: a scalable ecosystem for the next era of human thriving and performance.


If you’re exploring the intersection of longevity, mental health, neurotech, behavioral innovation, or organizational wellness — let’s connect.

teams.name: Bondi Finance
teams.shortDescription: Bondi lifts the barriers to invest in emerging market bonds with the power of blockchain.
teams.longDescription:
Bondi is a tokenized bond protocol that allows investors to buy tokenized emerging market bonds. It offers a solid alternative to:

1. DeFi lending markets
2. US corporate bonds
3. US Treasuries

This asset class remains inaccessible to most investors because of opaque industry practices and high entry limits. We aim to change that.

teams.name: Boto.io

teams.longDescription: Boto offers community where developers and non-developers can create and share their automation. They offer "programming recipes" to automate blockchain information dissemination, including NFTs.

teams.name: Boulder Tech Labs

teams.name: Butter

teams.name: Cabin
teams.shortDescription: A network of neighborhoods where you’d want to grow up
teams.longDescription:
Cabin is building a network city for our citizens, who span the globe and come together to colive and create in nature.

Citizens have passports that give them access to coliving and residencies at Cabin neighborhoods. Over the next few years, our city will grow to 5,040 founding citizens—the number that Aristotle thought made for an ideal polis. We collectively govern our city and build a network of neighborhoods from the ground up.

Over the past two years, our online community has designed and built a thriving coliving property called Neighborhood Zero in the Texas Hill Country. We are now expanding a shared culture, economy, and governance across a global network of physical neighborhoods designed for strong community, fast internet, and access to nature.

teams.name: California Forever

teams.longDescription: We manage these properties across four divisions: community building, energy, agriculture, and habitat conservation. We are committed to Solano County, and we look forward to being a good steward of these lands for generations to come.

teams.name: Canza Finance (Saukibit)

teams.longDescription: Canza is building a non-institutional-based financial system. They are a Neobank utilizing decentralized finance (DeFi) along with a network of experienced local money market players to distribute financial and transaction-based services to the masses.

teams.name: CeDeFiAi

CeDeFiAi: Uniting Centralized & Decentralized Finance with State-of-the-Art AI Solutions for Effortless Crypto Investments. 
Explore our Investment Aggregator, Crypto Lending, Pro Trade Terminal, Dex Aggregator, Multi-Sig Asset Management.

teams.name: Celo
teams.shortDescription: Celo is scaling Ethereum with real-world solutions, leading a thriving new digital economy for all.
teams.longDescription:
Where equal access is table stakes. Where collecting wealth is all about collective wealth. And where coordination with purpose leads to real-world change.

Together, we’re building a regenerative blockchain ecosystem that creates prosperity. Not just for the few, but for all.

teams.name: Cerebrum DAO

teams.longDescription: Cerebrum DAO is building the world’s largest engaged community focused on enabling scientific breakthroughs that prevent the onset of neurodegeneration and extend our healthy brain years. We’re connecting an expansive network of researchers, industry partners, and neuroscience supporters through the power of decentralized collaboration and transparent governance to accelerate solutions for some of science’s most complex challenges.

teams.name: Chain Agnostic Standards Alliance
teams.shortDescription: Coordinate open-source engineering efforts working on MIT-licensed chain-agnostic improvement proposals and other ways of making decentralized ecosystems interoperable.
teams.longDescription: "Decentralized systems" includes blockchains but also DPKI and other open-world models for data and/or infrastructure.

teams.name: Chainwall by OKcontract Labs
teams.shortDescription: Secure, scalable, non-custodial vault infrastructure for onchain finance
teams.longDescription:
We are building Chainwall Protocol - a secure, scalable, non-custodial vault infrastructure and digital asset management suite. Chainwall enables teams to operate vaults, rapidly whitelist authorized protocols and assets, propose new yield strategies and verify every transaction onchain before execution, eliminating blind signing, front-running and exposure to off-chain risks.


Finance is moving onchain, stablecoin and tokenized assets adoption is growing. Onchain funds won't sit idle, they will look for yields. DeFi yields are compelling, but come with security risks, cumbersome UX & front-running challenges.


Chainwall abstracts away complexity, streamlines operations and enforces transaction security. Our goal is to provide a robust and safe environment to access onchain yields and make fund transfers secure for web3 projects, fintechs, and professional asset managers.

teams.name: CitizenX
teams.shortDescription: Investing in citizenship
teams.longDescription: CitizenX is the world's first platform to help you find and fund countries that welcome you as a citizen. Secure a safe haven and travel freely across the globe with a passport from your new home(s).

teams.name: Clam Island

Users can also buy Clams and use them to produce Pearls, both of which are NFTs that users can use to generate yield, boost investment returns, keep, or sell to another collector.

teams.name: Cognisyn
teams.shortDescription: In our divided world we are unable to address the global challenge of our collective future. So we are creating a global simulation/game to enable people around the world to engage in a biosocial collaboration to draft a comprehensive Bill of Rights for Nature and People in the AI Era.
teams.longDescription:
Cognisyn’s mission is to bring the power of prediction to everyone using game theory, and complex system design to advance both cooperation in multi-agent systems and global human cooperation capabilities in a divided more than human world.  

To create new paradigms for Regenerative Economics so we can reimagine rights in a more than human world with intracommunity driven protocols for the stewardship of common resources, the verification of ecological state, and public goods that include the possibility of non-human organisms and ecosystems to own things.

To make the more than human world legible to economics, and rights discourse, so we can design a better future for our planet and AI together.

teams.name: Coinfeeds

teams.name: ConsenSys

teams.longDescription: ContributionDAO. teams.name: Convergent Research FROs

teams.longDescription: Convergent Research is a FRO incubator within the Schmidt Futures Network. They aim to help fill a structural gap in today's R&D system by bringing together talent from academia, industry and startups to build a new model for innovative R&D.

teams.name: Creative Commons
teams.shortDescription: The nonprofit behind the licenses and tools the world uses to share.
teams.longDescription: Creative Commons is a nonprofit organization dedicated to building a globally-accessible public commons of knowledge and culture. They make it easier for people to share creative and academic work, as well as to access and build upon the work of others. By helping people and organizations share knowledge and creativity, Creative Commons aim to build a more equitable, accessible, and innovative world.  In order to achieve our mission, they:  — Provide Creative Commons licenses and public domain tools that give every person and organization in the world a free, simple, and standardized way to grant copyright permissions for creative and academic works; ensure proper attribution; and allow others to copy, distribute, and make use of those works — Work closely with major institutions to ensure the correct use and implementation of CC licenses and CC-licensed content — Support the CC Global Network, a community initiative working to increase the volume, breadth, and quality of openly-available knowledge worldwide — Develop technology like CC Search that makes openly-licensed material easier to discover and use — Offer the Creative Commons Certificate, an in-depth course for people interested in becoming experts in creating and engaging with openly-licensed works — Produce CC Summit, an annual event that brings together an international group of educators, artists, technologists, legal experts, and activists to promote the power of open licensing and global access

teams.name: Crecimiento
teams.shortDescription: Crecimiento is a movement to transform Argentina's economy through Crypto Startups
teams.longDescription:
Crecimiento emerged from a simple yet powerful idea: it’s time to drive transformative crypto adoption across Argentina and redefine the country’s economic landscape. Argentina’s unique conditions, including high grassroots crypto adoption, world-class developer talent, strong political backing, and a wave of investor interest, have created an ideal environment to turn Argentina into a leading hub for crypto and tech innovation.


Our Vision for Transformation


Our vision at Crecimiento is to ignite a crypto-powered transformation. We’re here to help build an ecosystem that:


1. Brings 5 to 10 million people on-chain through impactful products and startups.


2. Amplifies Argentina’s tech ecosystem tenfold with infrastructure, funding, and ongoing support.


3. Establishes long-term stability for startups, offering over 20 years of regulatory continuity to foster sustainable growth.

teams.name: CryoDAO
teams.shortDescription: CryoDAO is a decentralized organization focused on sourcing and funding research in cryopreservation.
teams.longDescription:
Interest in cryopreservation is higher than ever, but there still isn't enough research happening in the field. Even small amounts of attention could achieve significant advancements in the field, such as creating new cryoprotective agents to reduce toxicity, or creating different cryoprotection protocols based on ischemia.

CryoDAO's objective is to contribute to cryopreservation research projects that have a high potential to increase the quality and capabilities of cryopreservation.

teams.name: Cryptio
teams.shortDescription: Enterprise-grade accounting, audit, and tax software for your digital assets.
teams.longDescription: Cryptio is an institutional-grade crypto accounting platform. Their software helps financial institutions, corporates and crypto-native companies navigate the fragmented digital-asset landscape. They are bridging the gap between the blockchain and accounting systems – transforming DeFi, custody, OTC, and exchange data into auditable records for accounting, treasury and tax filings.

teams.name: CryptoEconLab
teams.shortDescription: Design, research and modelling services to enable robust incentives and tokenomics for venture capital portfolios, protocols, ecosystems and startups.
teams.longDescription:
CryptoEconLab offers high-end and data-driven advisory services to teams and organizations within the Protocol Labs Network and the broader crypto ecosystem. We work with projects that take advantage of the unique properties of digital assets, computer science, network science, statistics, economics, and systems engineering.

CryptoEconLab helps blockchain projects succeed through effective Incentive Design and Go-to-Market strategies. We give advisory support and strategic investment to standout founders and teams. Whether you're launching a new protocol or scaling an existing one, we design sustainable token economies, align incentives, and drive growth. Through technical expertise and industry insights, our team will bring your vision to life.

Our Advisory divisions cover:

Audit & Assurance First Principles Mechanism Design Risk

Simulation & Financial Modelling

Strategy and Transformation

Smart Contract Engineering

Execution and Delivery Governance

Crypto is the future of digital finance, mainly because it allows humanity to send or receive value to any corner of the world without needing the validation of any intermediary. 

Most of the population now stands in the Traditional finance world. Our purpose is to be the bridge to the Decentralized finance world.

We are the winning horse because our focus is: User Experience + Web3 technology. 

Welcome to the future of finance!

teams.name: DeSci Foundation
teams.shortDescription: Scientists exploring the potential of new technologies, processes, and funding models.
teams.longDescription:
We support the development of a more verifiable, more open, and fairer ecosystem for science and scientists. The Desci Foundation is an independent organization of leading scientists and innovators. We are dedicated to exploring the potential of applying new technologies, incentives, processes, and funding models to the scientific ecosystem.

Our mission is to support high-quality science by: 
1) Carefully assessing the opportunities and risks of applying new technologies, incentives, processes, and funding models to the scientific ecosystem.
2) Guiding and supporting the development and implementation of new ways to enable high-quality, replicable science. 
3) Bringing scientists & innovators together. 
4) Enfranchising a group of stakeholders to steer the emerging ecosystem of decentralized science, such as that built by DeSci Labs. 

We are particularly passionate about projects that support:
1) Open science practices such as pre-registered analysis plans, open repositories, accessible code, and FAIR data.
2) Replication studies.
3) Open peer review.
4) Fair rewards for the work that scientists are doing.
5) Efficient funding models for research.

teams.name: DeSci Labs
teams.shortDescription: Making scientific research accessible to everyone
teams.longDescription:
DeSci Labs is making trustworthy scientific research available to everyone.


Our frontend product, SciWeave, is a non-hallucinating AI assistant that delivers reliable answers grounded in over 250 million peer-reviewed papers.


Behind it, DeSci Publish provides a decentralized publishing backbone that replaces paywalls and publication fees with open peer review and tokenized rewards for reviewers and editors.


Together, these tools form an open ecosystem where scientists, institutions, and the public can access, evaluate, and advance knowledge transparently. By aligning incentives between creators, validators, and users, DeSci Labs is creating the open trust layer for science — where every user becomes a stakeholder and every contribution drives the flywheel.


We have previously raised $6.5m and are now offering a limited token pre-sale to institutional investors, raising an additional $2m.

teams.name: DeSci London

teams.longDescription: We hold monthly meetups exploring the intersection between web3 and science. Decentralised Science (DeSci) is a growing movement hoping to realign incentives to solve some of the biggest problems in science.

teams.longDescription: DeSciWorld is an information repository and community engagement hub for the DeSci space. Our dashboard at desci.world makes it easy to understand all that is happening the world of DeSci. Our technical platform, Proof of Knowledge (PoK), facilitates on-chain knowledge sharing; provenance tracking and usage incentives are built in with the $KNOW token economy. Each unit of knowledge in the PoK system is vectorised, and optimised for machine readability. AI services usage of these units is tracked and incentivised. We hope to use Proof of Knowledge to create a human driven knowledge base at the centre of the AI revolution.

teams.name: EDRES
teams.shortDescription: Augmented Cognition Commons
teams.longDescription:
We are developing the digital commons of knowledge embedded in education, science and technology. The expanded taxonomy and providing economic incentives for researchers is the innovative solution of our DeSci project to deal with the public goods dilemma. Furthermore, EdRes systematizes scientific knowledge into a database for its effective processing and use by generative AI. 
EdRes users can: 
1)study and create education content (K-20). 
2)share science in our social network and collaborate in communities and become member of Science DAOs. 
3)get financed through a retroactive funding pool by our native knowledge backed token. 
With implementation of blockchain and AI, EdRes provides: 
1)Motivation and gamification to study and incentives to share the knowledge in the form of courses. 
2)Our social network to be able to gather, process and commercialize the data, as well as the efficient functioning of Science DAOs in various science disciplines to verify and evaluate users' proposals. The users share their science researches that would be verified, processed and used for training our AI. Then researchers in science and technology can use our AI to define and examine new hypotheses, find applicable experimental data and collaborate in communities to solve tasks.  
3)research financing based on the users’ applications evaluated by the Science DAO, issue of NFT collection and finance attraction using our modified retroactive funding pool mechanism.

EFF defends free speech on the Internet, fights illegal surveillance, supports freedom-enhancing technologies, and much more.  The EFF team consists of a unique blend of activists, technologists, and attorneys that work to ensure that the rights and freedoms we enjoy are enhanced, rather than eroded, as our use of technology grows. teams.name: Internet Archive
teams.shortDescription: The Internet Archive, a non-profit, is building a digital library of Internet sites and other cultural artifacts in digital form.
teams.longDescription:
Like a paper library, we provide free access to researchers, historians, scholars, people with print disabilities, and the general public. Our mission is to provide Universal Access to All Knowledge.

We began in 1996 by archiving the Internet itself, a medium that was just beginning to grow in use. Like newspapers, the content published on the web was ephemeral - but unlike newspapers, no one was saving it. Today we have 28+ years of web history accessible through the Wayback Machine and we work with 1,200+ library and other partners through our Archive-It program to identify important web pages.

As our web archive grew, so did our commitment to providing digital versions of other published works. Today our archive contains:

835 billion web pages
44 million books and texts
15 million audio recordings (including 255,000 live concerts)
10.6 million videos (including 2.6 million Television News programs)
4.8 million images
1 million software programs

teams.longDescription:
Key Points about the IPFS Foundation:

Open-source development: The IPFS protocol is open-source, meaning anyone can contribute to its development, and the Foundation fosters this collaborative environment.

Focus on standards and governance: The Foundation helps establish and maintain standards for the IPFS protocol, ensuring compatibility across different implementations and facilitating smooth data exchange between users.

Community building: The IPFS Foundation actively engages with the wider community of developers, users, and researchers to promote the adoption and improvement of IPFS technology.

teams.name: LexDAO.org
teams.shortDescription: Legal engineering and crypto law.
teams.longDescription: LexDAO is a club of legal engineering professionals united to bring the traditional legal settlement layer to code and coded agreements to the masses. We believe that everyone deserves access to justice in a quick and efficient manner. If legal services were easier to use, verify, and enforce, we could live in a fairer world. Distributed ledger technology offers solutions to many problems in the legal space. Our mission is to research, develop and evangelize first-class legal methods and blockchain protocols that secure rules and promises with code rather than trust. We do this by training LexDAO-certified legal engineers and building LexDAO-certified blockchain applications.

teams.name: Lido Finance
teams.shortDescription: Lido builds state of the art liquid staking protocols to grow the staking economy.
teams.longDescription:
Lido builds state of the art liquid staking protocols to grow the staking economy.  

Lido lets users stake their assets for daily staking rewards. User can stake any amount of tokens - no minimum.


When staking Lido you mint staked tokens which are issued 1:1 to your initial stake. Your staked tokens can be used across the DeFi ecosystem.

Lido lets you to use your staked assets as collateral, for lending and more. When using Lido, you receive staking rewards in real-time and also could use staked tokens across the DeFi ecosystem without any lock-ups.

Lido DAO is a community that builds liquid staking services and governs the direction of Lido. The number of DAO participants is growing daily with contributors working together to build the future of Lido.

teams.name: Lilypad Network
teams.shortDescription: Unleashing the power of decentralized, idle compute for AI
teams.longDescription:
Lilypad is a serverless, distributed compute network that will enable internet-scale data processing for AI, ML, and other arbitrary computation. Unleashing idle processing power by leveraging ​​decentralized infrastructure networks, Lilypad unlocks a new marketplace for compute, making AI more accessible, efficient, and transparent for developers and users.

Challenges such as cost, vendor lock-in, and resource intensity impede developers from seamlessly integrating projects that require high-performance computing, such as AI technologies, into their applications. Lilypad mitigates these challenges by providing an independent global compute network accessible to everyone, extending unrestricted, permissionless access to computational power. By enhancing the efficiency, transparency, and accessibility of high-performance computing hardware, Lilypad empowers a multitude of possible applications including AI inferencing, ML training, and providing cross-chain interoperability complement to bridge protocols.

teams.name: Lomads
teams.shortDescription: The go-to treasury & payments workflow automation platform with Soulbound Token integration for Web3 Projects & DAOs.
teams.longDescription:
Lomads is focused on streamlining transactions and permissions for organizations through our automation features.

We allow organizations to: 

- Easily automate various transactions such as recurring payments, milestone-based payments, bounties, and batch payments. 

- Launch Soulbound Tokens (SBT) for their members. These tokens can be used to automate permissions for various Web2 and Web3 apps (such as Discord, Notion, and Snapshot) based on members' roles and contributions.

Validation is essential for transactions, and over time, SBTs will play a crucial role in enabling permissionless transactions. This one-of-a-kind combination of dashboards with SBTs gives Lomads a strong edge over the competition and primes it for ecosystem growth and expansion.

They collaborated with their founders to develop their tokenomics, governance, and communities through Asia DeFi Network.   With the LongHashX Accelerator, they have partnered with Polkadot and Filecoin to build more than 40 global Web 3 projects which have raised more than $100m in the past 3 years.

teams.longDescription:
At Manteca, we develop APIs to enable fintech companies to seamlessly integrate currency exchange, crypto, and brokerage services, ensuring simple, secure, and no integration costs or minimum transaction requirements.

Our flagship products include:

+ Exchange API: Provide your users with access to competitive rates for official or parallel exchange rates, with all licenses and compliance issues resolved.

+ Crypto API: Implement crypto exchange services, on and off-ramp against ARS or USD, and DeFi, at the most competitive market rates. We also support deposits and withdrawals in ARS, USD, and major cryptocurrencies across different blockchains, always in compliance with regulatory requirements.

+ Brokerage API: Integrate stock company services to trade bonds, stocks, MEP dollar, Investment Funds (FCIs), repo transactions, CEDEARs, and more, with configurable commissions and pre-resolved compliance.

We are the key ingredient in the fintech kitchen.

It allows both smart contract calls and web2 APIs to be used to rent instances or execute serverless functions. As a result, Marlin can be used as a coprocessor to scale blockchain applications.

However, we all search, filter, read and take notes about content online and produce information valuable to other people.

Memex helps you share your reading & research output so that you can build on each others’ research and easily compare contrary idea. 
It's a personal & collaborative reader to collect, annotate and discuss websites, PDFs and Youtube videos. By yourself or with your team and community.

Memex is funded with a novel investor/team reward model with the goal of reducing profit maximisation incentives & ensure long-term alignment with the interests of our users and ecosystem: More about that here: https://links.memex.garden/RegenerativeFunding 

We raised 225k out of our 250k pre-seed round to turn Memex into a collaborative reader for knowledge communities on Discord, Slack and Telegram. https://links.memex.garden/MemexDiscordDemo

teams.name: MicroCrop
teams.shortDescription: MicroCrop provides blockchain-powered, weather-indexed crop insurance for African smallholder farmers, delivering instant, automated payouts via M-Pesa when adverse weather events occur, using real-time data from WeatherXM weather stations.
teams.longDescription:
MicroCrop is building a decentralized, weather-indexed crop insurance platform tailored for African smallholder farmers. Using real-time, hyperlocal weather data from decentralized stations (such as WeatherXM), our system automatically triggers and processes payouts via mobile money (M-Pesa) when weather conditions exceed pre-defined risk thresholds, eliminating the need for lengthy claims processes or manual assessments.

Our mission is to protect farmers from the financial shocks of droughts, floods, and other climate-related events, while improving trust, speed, and accessibility in agricultural insurance. MicroCrop also integrates with agribusinesses, cooperatives, and NGOs to bundle insurance with seeds, fertilizer, and advisory services, making coverage affordable and easy to access.

By combining blockchain transparency, weather intelligence, and mobile-first distribution, we aim to bridge the protection gap in agricultural communities and enable farmers to confidently invest in their livelihoods.

NEAR also emphasizes cross-chain interoperability, allowing seamless asset transfers between different blockchain networks, thus fostering a vibrant ecosystem for decentralized finance (DeFi) and digital ownership. With its community-operated infrastructure, NEAR positions itself as a key player in the evolution of the decentralized web, empowering users to take control of their digital experiences.

The platform’s business model is based on taking commissions on insurance premiums, with an initial focus on institutional customers that need scalable, programmatic protection for their on-chain positions. Unlike competitors such as Nexus or Katalysis, SAFU insures assets rather than individuals, eliminating the need for KYC and reducing onboarding friction. teams.name: SkyFall
teams.shortDescription:
SkyFall is a decentralized weather-derivatives platform that gives farmers instant, automated payouts when adverse weather hits, using verifiable, tradable weather data instead of slow, claims-based insurance.

## What the product does  
SkyFall provides crop-yield protection through on-chain weather options that trigger payouts automatically based on oracle-fed weather indices, eliminating claims handling, delays, and disputes.
It targets the large, underinsured agricultural market with low, customizable premiums and borderless access, while offering traders and “degens” a way to speculate on and provide liquidity to weather markets.

Problem and impact  
The product addresses three main pain points in traditional agricultural insurance: delayed payouts, high premiums, and a large uninsured farmer population
By automating payouts and leveraging decentralized infrastructure, SkyFall aims to improve climate resilience for farmers in regions like North Africa
teams.longDescription:
SkyFall is a decentralized weather-derivatives platform that transforms how farmers protect their income from climate risk by turning real-world weather into instant, automated, on-chain payouts rather than slow, claims-based insurance. It uses verifiable, manipulation-resistant weather data and parametric options to offer affordable, customizable protection for smallholder and commercial farmers, while opening a new asset class for traders and liquidity providers who want exposure to weather markets.

Problem and opportunity

Traditional agricultural insurance suffers from delayed and disputed payouts, high premiums, and leaves a large share of farmers globally either underinsured or completely uninsured. At the same time, the agricultural insurance market is worth tens of billions of dollars annually with a significant protection gap, creating a large opportunity for a programmable, borderless alternative.

How SkyFall works

SkyFall structures coverage as weather options tied to objective indices such as rainfall, temperature, or other climate variables, with smart contracts that trigger payouts automatically when pre-defined thresholds are met. A decentralized oracle network feeds high-quality, tradable weather data on-chain, so neither insurers nor intermediaries can delay, deny, or manipulate claims, and farmers know in advance exactly when and how they will be paid.

Value for farmers and traders

For farmers, SkyFall offers low, customizable premiums, borderless access via mobile-friendly interfaces, and instant settlement when adverse weather hits, helping stabilize yields, household income, and the ability to replant after shocks. For traders and “degens,” SkyFall creates a new type of market where they can provide liquidity or take directional views on weather risk, earning fees and yield while effectively backstopping climate resilience in emerging markets.

Traction & Momentum: 

• Rapid Network Growth: Achieved 753.8 Gbps global bandwidth with 112% MoM capacity growth and serving 28 enterprise customers including TikTok and Tencent.

• Validated PMF: Reached $2M+ ARR in just 8 months of testnet operations across 6 active markets. 

• Real Global Scale: Organically grew to over 2.2+ million registered nodes over 5 testnets in 108+ countries, creating a powerful last-mile delivery and compute network with <10ms latency. 

• Strategic ”CDN + AI" Expansion: Launched a browser extension, already surpassed 180k+ installs, unlocking a new enterprise IP leasing service for AI, web scraping and data clients. 

• Long-Term Vision: Our current playbook projects a clear path to $863.7M in revenue within 5 years by capturing a significant share of the global CDN and AI markets.


Seed Extension: Raising $5m at a $50m valuation. The round is already joined by Cointelegraph (investor + media partner), Polygon, Charlie Songhurst (Board of Directors - Meta) and others.

Vivid Visions isn’t just about creativity; we’re creating culture. If you're searching for the spot where big ideas collide with bold talent, you've found it.

Vivid Visions is reimagining governance models to explore new approaches to land regeneration. We are pioneering a system that brings together artists, communities, and industry leaders to co-create governance frameworks that value natural restoration. By facilitating experimental projects, we aim to provide artists with opportunities to collaborate on land regeneration initiatives that restore balance to ecosystems, revitalize local habitats, and address pressing environmental challenges. These projects not only empower artists but also serve as prototypes for scalable environmental solutions. 

Through these innovative governance models, we’re challenging the norms of traditional land ownership and management, encouraging a culture of shared responsibility and creative stewardship. We envision a network of artists who advocate for the earth by developing visual narratives that inspire collective action, shifting perspectives on sustainability, and motivating lasting ecological change. With Vivid Visions, art becomes more than a reflection of beauty—it becomes a blueprint for a thriving, regenerative future.

In our dual role as an artist agency and design collective, we understand that sustainable impact requires both a commitment to artistic integrity and a willingness to take bold, visionary steps. Together with our partners, clients, and artists, we aim to cultivate an ecosystem where creativity and regeneration are seamlessly intertwined, shaping a legacy that extends far beyond the visual, touching the landscapes and lives that inspire it.
